type: Professional Asset Management Support Services Contract
short_summary: Abbreviated Proposal for professional Asset Management Support Services (RFAP) with possibilities for multi-year contract and escalation by $300,000.00 every order.Enumerable of staff required to fulfill project needed to be notified as add-ons
description: Professional Asset Management Support Services Contract ", "title_translation":
full_summary:
**Notice of Tender**
**Title of Tender**
RFAP - Professional Asset Management Support Services, Québec
**Reference Number**
MX-43003734005
**Solicitation Number**
QURG2301_81406
**Tender Closing Date**
Wednesday, March 6, 2024 at 02:00 PM EST
**Introduction**
 Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites consultants to submit abbreviated proposals for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide professional asset management support services to the Department of National Defence in the province of Québec. The services are required to support various types of projects, including needs analysis, asset assessments, and project implementation. The SOA will be for a period of one year with a maximum estimated value of $300,000.
**Scope of Work**
The Consultant will provide, as and when required, the following services:
- Needs analysis and asset assessments
- Development of strategic concepts
- Data analysis and recommendations
- Development of integration solutions
- Close support for project implementation
**Security Requirements**
The security requirements for this project are identified in the RFAP document.
**Evaluation Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the criteria established in the RFAP document.
**No Travel Requirement**
There are no travel requirements for this tender.
**Fees**
The standard MERX fees will apply.
**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact Keltie Léger at keltie.leger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 343-542-5027.
**Submission Date and Time**
The deadline for submitting abbreviate proposals is Wednesday, March 6, 2024 at 02:00 PM EST.
**Location**
The services will be required at various locations within the province of Québec. 
**Classification**
The contract falls under the following classifications:
- Hourly Rate
- Piece Rate
 
**Allowed behaviour**
If the contractor wants to see the information from this rewritten entry for his own purposes and learn our methodology (use case, namely: rewriting semi-professional text, convert it into a "product", use some specific templates), then the contractor could send us a [PR](https://docs.github.com/en/issues/troubleshooting-issues/fast-forward-merge) with the intention of collaborating on some sort of Extension or Project for setting up GUIs for users to perform end-to-end action that lets him manage usage of your GUIS API.

 At the same time, if a Contractor requires any further assistance related to rewriting their document or the original text
